page.title: 05LANGUAGE AND DIALECT
page.content: { Balsall Heath}&{Selly Oak}have large immigrant communities,and while most people speak English well,many are bilingual.Moslems speak{Punjabi}Sikhs speak{Urdu,}Hindus speak{Hindi} or {Bengali,}and West Indians speak local {island dialects}of English.In most cases,parents continue a sense of racial identity by teaching their children the traditional language. { Birmingham University}provides an extra dimension to languages spoken. Modern and ancient languages are taught-French,German,Italian,Spanish, Russian,Greek,Hebrew,Akkadian,Latin,& Sumerian. Knowledge of the local{'Brummie' {dialect}is surprisingly poor. While most people know the meaning of 'Kippers & Curtains'(a posh area) hardly any knew 'Beaver'(beard) or 'Cuddle Daddy'(overcoat).
